Description.Chinese:
Silo only provides +50% production boost, but only in form of additional goods (1 every 2 cycles). 
Tractor does not increase amount of fields but still decreases workers. Provides +100% production boost, but also in form of additional goods (1 every cylce).
Description.English:
Silo only provides +50% production boost, but only in form of additional goods (1 every 2 cycles). 
Tractor does not increase amount of fields but still decreases workers. Provides +100% production boost, but also in form of additional goods (1 every cylce).
Description.French:

Description.German:
Silo bringen nur noch +50% Produktivitätsbonus, allerdings nur in Form von zusätzlichen Waren (1 alle 2 Zyklen).
Traktoren erhöhen nicht mehr die Anzahl von Feldern, aber verringern immernoch die nötigen Arbeiter. Sie bringen +100% Produktivität, aber ebenfalls nur in Form von zusätzlichen Gütern (1 jeden Zyklus).
